What causes Hallermann-Streiff syndrome ?,"What causes Hallermann-Streiff syndrome? The genetic cause of Hallerman-Streiff syndrome has not been identified. It reportedly typically occurs randomly for unknown reasons (sporadically), most likely due to a new spontaneous (de novo) mutation in the affected individual.",GARD,Hallermann-Streiff syndrome
